titles.title: To limit the use of Federal funds for the use of the travel expenses of senior Federal officials in contravention of certain regulations, and for other purposes.
Taxpayers DIME Act of 2019
Taxpayers DIME Act of 2019
Taxpayers Don't Incur Meaningless Expenses Act of 2019
Taxpayers Don’t Incur Meaningless Expenses Act of 2019
Taxpayers DIME Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Taxpayers Don't Incur Meaningless Expenses Act of 2019 or the Taxpayers DIME Act of 2019
This bill prohibits the use of federal funds for travel expenses of senior federal officials in violation of specified federal travel regulations.
